description:
Gadhio Lathcutt is a famous S Class Adventurer whose talents proved worthy of making one of the seven chosen members of the Hero Party where me met and befriended Flum Apricot and Eterna Rinebow. He would eventually leave the party not long after both of them left the party and took on the role of being the Guild Master of the West Quarter Adventurer`s Guild.
Source: Roll Over and Die Wiki
name: Gadhio Lathcutt
